pou.name: iecUNIX2DT
pou.pounote:
Extract date from UNIX timestamp DST: when set to TRUE, add one hour for Day Saving Time UTC is the time zone (For example 1 for Paris, 0 for UTC)
Caution with DST behaviour : DST = TRUE means it will offset one hour DST = FALSE means it will not offset one hour The information of if a we are in summer is NOT extracted from the timestamp input. This information should have been stored with the timestamp in a separate boolean.
IMPORTANT! Due to the computing of LREAL, precision for milliseconds is +/- 0.001 Ex. 0.748 in LREAL may be displayed '747' on the MILLISECONDS output
